General.Name: Kora Saude Participacoes SA
General.Description: Kora Saúde Participações S.A. owns and operates hospitals in Brazil. It has hospitals in Espírito Santo, Tocantins, Mato Grosso, Distrito Federal, Goiás, and Ceará. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Vitória, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Des. Santos Neves, 207, Vitória, ES, Brazil
